title: US agreement for assessing rare earth, mineral investments does not affect state revenues — deputy minister
desc: Clause 5.2.3 of the Malaysia-US trade agreement, which sets up a joint mechanism to assess foreign investments in rare earths and critical minerals, does not directly affect state revenues, including royalties or land premiums.
